# STAT5385-stats-in-research

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of this repository is to make my assignments' R codes for a course I'm currently taking in Advanced Regression Analysis, titled "**Statistics in Research**" at the University of Texas at El Paso,  available to some of my classmates who requested for them.
